short_summary: Request for Digital Signatures Solution for Transport Canada(TC)
description: Shared Services Canada (SSC), on behalf of Transport Canada (TC), has a requirement for a Digital Signature Solution. Transport Canada (TC) is looking to implement a digital signature solution to support the need for digital signature for external clients/stakeholders.
